translations: n．就职典礼，开幕式：一个正式的仪式，用于庆祝某人就任某个职位或某个活动的开始。
· Presidential inaugurations are held every four years in the United States.
美国总统就职典礼每四年举行一次。

sentences.sentence: Its inauguration page also features videos of inaugurations from decades past.
sentences.translation: 就职网页还有以往数十年的就职视频。

sentences.sentence: By comparison, shortly after their inaugurations, Obama was at 68 percent and Bush was at 57 percent in Gallup surveys.
sentences.translation: 可以做个对比，奥巴马在刚刚上任之后不久支持率达到了68%，布什也曾在盖洛普民调中获得了57%的支持率。
